actions.name: GetAdditionalSellerNotificationRecipients

actions.description: Grants permission to view bank account verification status

actions.description: Grants permission to view secondary user account verification status

actions.name: GetSellerVerificationDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to view account verification status

actions.name: PutAdditionalSellerNotificationRecipients
actions.description: Grants permission to update additional seller notification recipients

actions.name: PutBankAccountVerificationDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to update bank account verification status

actions.name: PutSecondaryUserVerificationDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to update secondary user account verification status

actions.name: PutSellerVerificationDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to update account verification status

actions.name: uploadFiles
actions.description: Allows access to the File Upload page inside the AWS Marketplace Management Portal
